name: Physicality: A Retrospective
description:
"Welcome, Human #3508! You have now entered the "Physicality: A Retrospective" gallery simulation. On display are artifacts and images of the OldWorld™️- our pre-virtualized society. Enter to experience the life of our ancestors."

Touch and grab  to experience the true nature of these essential physical objects. Observe and contemplate the pictures on the wall to get context for their usage. Who knew they had it so good?

Controls: 

Walking- WASD keys  /   Grab object - Left mouse button /  Crouch - shift 

Exit game - ESC key
